content.text:
Let me analyze the target image and provide instructions for building both structures.

Structure 1 (Left Structure - Tower with legs):
- Has 3 layers
- Made of orange cylindrical legs, yellow rectangular blocks on top, and a green vertical block with yellow cap

Structure 2 (Right Structure - Abstract figure):
- Has multiple layers
- Combines red, yellow, green, and blue blocks in a more complex arrangement

Let me break down the assembly instructions for both structures:

For the Left Structure:
{
Step1: Move block with index 12 (orange cylinder)
Step2: Move block with index 12 (orange cylinder)
Step3: Move block with index 12 (orange cylinder)
Step4: Move block with index 8 (yellow horizontal block)
Step5: Move block with index 8 (yellow horizontal block)
Step6: Move block with index 6 (green vertical block)
Step7: Move block with index 13 (yellow curved cap)
}

For the Right Structure:
{
Step1: Move block with index 3 (blue cube)
Step2: Move block with index 7 (green horizontal block)
Step3: Move block with index 11 (yellow horizontal block)
Step4: Move block with index 1 (red U-shaped block)
Step5: Move block with index 7 (green horizontal block)
Step6: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular block)
Step7: Move block with index 13 (yellow curved block)
Step8: Move block with index 13 (yellow curved block)
}

The blocks should be assembled from bottom to top, ensuring stability of the structure as you build. Each step builds upon the previous one to create the final forms shown in the target image.
